entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is described as taking over the watch at midnight. She is also mentioned as reading a book by the light of a wand.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry's dreams are confused and disturbing, and he wakes up repeatedly thinking that someone has called out to him.

entities.name: nagini
entities.description: Nagini is mentioned as weaving in and out of Harry's dreams.

entities.name: sneakoscope
entities.description: The Sneakoscope is described as silent and motionless on the table.

entities.name: a history of magic
entities.description: Hermione is reading this book by the light of a wand.

relationships.description: Nagini weaves in and out of Harry's dreams.
Hermione is reading this book by the light of a wand.
Harry glances at the silent, motionless Sneakoscope on the table.
Hermione greets Harry's suggestion of packing up early and moving on with relief.
